user.title: Network Frame Detector
user.description: Configure a network frame detection rule. This integration listens for specific patterns in network traffic on a specified port.

data_description.name: A unique name for this detection rule
data_description.pattern_type: Type of pattern matching: string, regex, or hex
data_description.pattern_value: The pattern to match against packet payloads
data_description.sensor_duration: How long the sensor stays ON after detection (1-3600 seconds)
data_description.source_ip: Optional: Only match packets from this source IP address

error.invalid_hex: Hex pattern must contain only hexadecimal characters and be even length
error.invalid_cooldown: Cooldown must be between 0 and 3600 seconds
error.invalid_duration: Sensor duration must be between 1 and 3600 seconds

abort.already_configured: This detection rule is already configured
abort.port_in_use: Port is already in use by another rule
